item.title: Secure Contact Form
item.description: Choosing a CMS In a previous post I mentioned why this blog was created. This post will present how it's contact form works. At first, I quickly searched for blogging software that would suite my needs and found Hugo. I like the idea of a static website because: Generated files are static - They will faster when compared to loading from a database. There is no database that can fail on you (except the hard-drive of the server).
